http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif ADMIN-EO List ADMIN-EO List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ADMIN-EO&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ADMIN-EO.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-11T21:04:04Z IQBAL Hifsa 2015-03-11T21:03:53+00:00 2015-03-11T21:03:53+00:00 Re: Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;6cf5c82f.1503 Hello All<br><br>Just to put things into context. In the days of early Islam women would pray behind the men - no curtains, no barriers. They would enter from the same doors and leave by the same route.<br><br>All these rules and regulations that we now see in place are cultural and are based from one particular school of thought. It is not based on anything else. And things will differ depending on which part of the world you are from (some mosques still don't allow women in never mind praying in-front / side by side with men. [...] Pam Owen 2015-03-11T15:42:06+00:00 2015-03-11T15:42:06+00:00 Re: Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;7fc9111c.1503 We have had a curtain divider in our one of our multi faith rooms and a screen divider in the other for about four years now and as far as I am aware there has not been any concerns about this from our Muslim students.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Pam<br><br>Pam Owen<br>Equality & Diversity Manager<br>Bucks New University<br>High Wycombe Campus<br>Queen Alexandra Road<br>High Wycombe<br>Buckinghamshire<br>HP11 2JZ<br>01494 603 098<br>pam.owen@bucks.ac.uk [...] Lynda Tout 2015-03-11T11:25:25+00:00 2015-03-11T11:25:25+00:00 Re: Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;53d44962.1503 We've always had requests from our female Muslim students to pray separately so have provided a separate room. For note, we have also found that even when a separate room is provided, our female students have chosen to pray privately in their rooms (when in on-campus accommodation). Obviously consultation is key as there are vast cultural differences. Our students from Malaysia having vastly different expectations to those from Oman for instance (although I'm still generalising of course so we regularly consult with individuals). [...] Lesley Bradshaw 2015-03-11T11:22:59+00:00 2015-03-11T11:22:59+00:00 Re: Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;f99bc3c8.1503 Hi<br><br>I found this on the internet - it may help<br><br>http://www.onislam.net/english/ask-about-islam/faith-and-worship/aspects-of-worship/166196-about-rules-of-praying-in-mosques.html<br><br>Lesley<br><br>Lesley Bradshaw<br>Head of Equality and Diversity<br>University of Derby<br>Tel: 01332 591433<br>Email: L.a.bradshaw@derby.ac.uk<mailto:L.a.bradshaw@derby.ac.uk><br><br>Have your say - consultation on Gender Neutral Toilets<https://staff.derby.ac.uk/sites/hr/Equality-Diversity/Pages/Consultation.aspx><br><br>[cid:image013.jpg@01D05BED.BACDF160] [cid:image014.png@01D05BED.BACDF160] [cid:image015.jpg@01D05BED.BACDF160]<br>[cid:image007.png@01D05BED.B6F1C8A0][cid:image016.jpg@01D05BED.BACDF160] [cid:image017.jpg@01D05BED.BACDF160] [cid:image012.jpg@01D05BED.B6F1C8A0]<br><br>From: HEEON equal opportunities list [mailto:ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Marije Davidson<br>Sent: 11 March 2015 10:52<br>To: ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side [...] Stuart McKenna 2015-03-11T11:10:33+00:00 2015-03-11T11:10:33+00:00 Re: Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;4040f60e.1503 Hi Marjie,<br><br>We are very fortunate at Keele to have the Islamic Centre on campus, with<br>separate prayer, washing facilities and entrances for men and women:<br>http://www.keele.ac.uk/faith/islam/<br><br>I would be happy to pass on your query to our Islamic Society for an<br>opinion, if you thought this might be useful.<br><br>Warmest regards<br><br>Stuart McKenna<br>Equality and Diversity Manager<br>Keele University<br>Staffordshire<br>ST5 5BG [...] Marije Davidson 2015-03-11T10:51:33+00:00 2015-03-11T10:51:33+00:00 Multifaith prayer room (Islam) - women and men praying side by side https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;b0807e8a.1503 We are installing a curtain divider in our multi faith prayer room to allow Muslim women and men to pray separately, but in the same room. For several reasons, the curtain would divide the room in a way that women and men pray side by side.<br><br>We have now been asked by two Muslim men to divide the room so that men pray in front, and women pray in the back. The argument being that the Qu'ran requires people to pray side by side in rows not in columns, and also that women wouldn't find it discriminatory because it's tradition/custom. [...] McDuff, Nona P 2015-03-09T13:12:04+00:00 2015-03-09T13:12:04+00:00 Re: Equality and Diversity Committee Terms of Reference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;529c4ad5.1503 Dear Alison<br>Here is our EC TOR as requested.<br>Best wishes<br>Nona<br><br>Nona McDuff MSc Cert Education<br>Director of Equality, Diversity and Inclusion I Vice Chancellor's Office<br><br>Chair of the Higher Education Race Action Group<br>Executive Board Member of Kingston's Race and Equalities Council<br>Member of the London Higher Diversity in Leadership Project Steering Group<br>Member of Leadership Foundation Diversity Advisory Group [...] Fiona McPhail 2015-03-09T12:54:40-00:00 2015-03-09T12:54:40-00:00 Re: Inclusive Website Design https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;fd861d22.1503 Hi Stuart,<br><br>That's really kind of you, thank you! I am very grateful as I have been<br>trawling with limited success.<br><br>Very best wishes,<br><br>Fiona<br><br>Fiona McPhail<br><br>From: HEEON equal opportunities list [mailto:ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On<br>Behalf Of Stuart McKenna<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:39<br>To: ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Inclusive Website Design<br><br>Hi Fiona,<br><br>The W3C website is the most comprehebnsive, particularly in relation to<br>disability access: http://www.w3.org/WAI/users/Overview.html [...] Stuart McKenna 2015-03-09T12:38:46+00:00 2015-03-09T12:38:46+00:00 Re: Inclusive Website Design https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;d5743cc7.1503 Hi Fiona,<br><br>The W3C website is the most comprehebnsive, particularly in relation to<br>disability access: http://www.w3.org/WAI/users/Overview.html<br><br>Warmest Regards<br><br>Stuart McKenna<br>Equality and Diversity Manager<br>Keele University<br>Staffordshire<br>ST5 5BG<br><br>Tel: 01782 733807<br>E-mail: s.mckenna@keele.ac.uk<br><br>Green:Keele - Please think before you print.<br><br>[image:<br>http://www.keele.ac.uk/pressreleases/2014/keelestudentsthemostsatisfiedinthecountry.htm]<br><http://www.keele.ac.uk/pressreleases/2014/keelestudentsthemostsatisfiedinthecountry.htm><br><br>On 9 March 2015 at 12:09, Fiona McPhail <fiona@mwaconsultancy.fsnet.co.uk><br>wrote:<br><br>> Dear colleagues,<br>><br>><br>><br>> I have been trying to find some detailed guidance/ checklists on inclusive<br>> website design. Although I have found some interesting articles, much of<br>> the material I have come across is fairly straightforward and covers issues<br>> such [...] Fiona McPhail 2015-03-09T12:09:43-00:00 2015-03-09T12:09:43-00:00 Inclusive Website Design https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;648bce1e.1503 Dear colleagues,<br><br>I have been trying to find some detailed guidance/ checklists on inclusive<br>website design. Although I have found some interesting articles, much of the<br>material I have come across is fairly straightforward and covers issues such<br>as non- gendered language. Is anyone aware of anything more comprehensive<br>that they could sign post me to? [...] Madeleine Law 2015-03-09T12:05:07+00:00 2015-03-09T12:05:07+00:00 Re: Equality and Diversity Committee Terms of Reference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;1da71b28.1503 Hi Tess<br><br>Here is a copy of our Terms of Reference for the Diversity Working Group.<br><br>Madeleine Stuart McKenna 2015-03-09T11:59:58+00:00 2015-03-09T11:59:58+00:00 Re: Equality and Diversity Committee Terms of Reference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;575e0cdf.1503 Hi All,<br><br>At Keele we are taking a slightly different approach. We have decided to<br>dissolve the E&D Committee of Council. This means that all E&D pieces will<br>be discussed at University Exec Ctte. and at Council - the ultimate<br>decision making body. This gives the agenda a much higher and broader<br>profile.<br><br>Warmest Regards<br><br>Stuart McKenna<br>Equality and Diversity Manager<br>Keele University<br>Staffordshire<br>ST5 5BG [...] Kwabena equal opportunities list [mailto:ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Tessa Marshall<br>Sent: 06 March 2015 10:03<br>To: ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Equality and Diversity Committee Terms of Reference [...] Tessa Marshall 2015-03-06T10:02:45+00:00 2015-03-06T10:02:45+00:00 Equality and Diversity Committee Terms of Reference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;b4b8e555.1503 Hello All,<br><br>Further to Alison's request below, the University of Brighton is currently establishing a new Equality and Diversity Committee and we were also wondering whether any colleagues were willing to share their Equality and Diversity Committee Terms of Reference with us.<br><br>Many thanks in advance,<br>Tess<br><br>Tessa Marshall<br>Equalities and Compliance Officer<br>University of Brighton [...] Guise, Sarah 2015-03-05T15:28:31+00:00 2015-03-05T15:28:31+00:00 E&D guidance for people developing training https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;1f7b7dbb.1503 Hi All,<br><br>I'm just about to have a go at drafting some guidance for our organisational development team on 'mainstreaming' EDI in non E&D training, for use by our in-house training consultants and also external suppliers (where they are not experts in this). I'm guessing someone's done this before, so if you have anything similar could you please share it with me? Happy to collate response if there are several. Something short e.g. 2-4 pages would be good. [...] Soraya Cotwal 2015-03-05T13:31:27+00:00 2015-03-05T13:31:27+00:00 Re: Ramadan and exams https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;d5331a44.1503 Hi Janet<br><br>Hope it's not too late to contribute to your thread, but here is a link to<br>a resource we have put together for staff and students which has been used<br>very successfully for the last two years:<br><br>http://www.port.ac.uk/departments/services/equalityanddiversity/downloads/filetodownload,179456,en.pdf<br><br>Hope it's helpful.<br><br>Kind regards<br><br>Soraya<br><br>On 2 March 2015 at 10:37, Jane Tope <D.J.Tope@bham.ac.uk> wrote:<br><br>> Hi folks,<br>><br>> Does anyone have a FAQs factsheet for academics and other staff about<br>> Ramadan and the exam period that they are willing to share please?<br>><br>><br>><br>> Jane<br>><br>><br>><br>> Jane Tope<br>><br>> Equality [...] Alison Simcox 2015-03-05T09:48:57+00:00 2015-03-05T09:48:57+00:00 Re: Definition of inclusion https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;226dad67.1503 Many thanks for this Joan, very helpful.<br>Kind regards<br>Alison<br><br>From: HEEON equal opportunities list [mailto:ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Joan O' Mahony<br>Sent: 04 March 2015 13:04<br>To: ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Definition of inclusion<br><br>Hi Alison,<br><br>HEA have two relevant publications; both discuss inclusive design and inclusive curriculum in their opening pages.<br><br>Christine Hockings: Inclusive learning and teaching in higher education: a synthesis of research https://www.heacademy.ac.uk/resources/detail/resources/detail/evidencenet/Inclusive_learning_and_teaching_in_higher_education<br>and Morgan and Houghton's Inclusive curriculum design in higher education<br>https://www.heacademy.ac.uk/resources/detail/inclusion/Disability/Inclusive_curriculum_design_in_higher_education<br>Hope you find something useful... [...] Akinsanya, Moni 2015-03-04T16:29:52+00:00 2015-03-04T16:29:52+00:00 FW: Women in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) lecture 29th April 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;8b0de570.1503 Dear Colleague,<br><br>Liverpool John Moores University is hosting a public talk to be presented by the Vice Chancellor of University of Brunel, Professor Julia Buckingham DSC.<br><br>The talk titled, "Targeting the Glass Ceiling", will follow an interview style format to be facilitated by BBC Radio Presenter Linda McDermott. Professor Buckingham will speak honestly about the difficulties women face in making it to Professorship, her personal experience of development and promotion and tips for overcoming some of these challenges. Following this session, the audience will be engaged in a question and answer session to discuss the particular challenges affecting the career [...] Joan O' Mahony 2015-03-04T13:04:23+00:00 2015-03-04T13:04:23+00:00 Re: Definition of inclusion https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;7f872d71.1503 Hi Alison,<br><br>HEA have two relevant publications; both discuss inclusive design and inclusive curriculum in their opening pages.<br><br>Christine Hockings: Inclusive learning and teaching in higher education: a synthesis of research https://www.heacademy.ac.uk/resources/detail/resources/detail/evidencenet/Inclusive_learning_and_teaching_in_higher_education<br>and Morgan and Houghton's Inclusive curriculum design in higher education<br>https://www.heacademy.ac.uk/resources/detail/inclusion/Disability/Inclusive_curriculum_design_in_higher_education<br>Hope you find something useful...<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Joan<br><br>Dr Joan O' Mahony<br>Consultant in Academic Practice [...] Kerridge-Poonia K. 2015-03-04T12:59:57+00:00 2015-03-04T12:59:57+00:00 Re: Definition of inclusion https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;e16dbade.1503 Dear All<br><br>I too would be interested in the response to both questions if possible,<br><br>Kind Regards<br><br>Kamaljit<br><br>Kamaljit Kerridge-Poonia<br>Head of Equality and Diversity<br>University Of Southampton<br>Highfield Campus,<br>Southampton<br>SO17 1BJ<br><br>TEL:023 8059 2945<br><br>This email and any attachments are confidential and intended solely for the addressee and may also be privileged or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If you are not the addressee, or have received this e-mail in error, please notify the sender immediately, delete it from your system and do not copy, disclose or otherwise act upon any part of this email or its [...] Alison Simcox 2015-03-04T12:57:13+00:00 2015-03-04T12:57:13+00:00 Re: Definition of inclusion https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;e1b2deaf.1503 Dear All<br>I would also be interested in being copied into this please.<br><br>In addition we are currently looking at reviewing our Diversity and Equality Committee composition and terms of reference, and wondered if any of the group would be willing to share theirs with us?<br>Kind regards<br>Alison<br><br>From: HEEON equal opportunities list [mailto:ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Maynard, Esther<br>Sent: 02 March 2015 10:58<br>To: ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Definition of inclusion [...] Paul Marks-Jones 2015-03-02T11:07:53+00:00 2015-03-02T11:07:53+00:00 Re: Ramadan and exams https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;4117325.1503 Hello Jane<br><br>We produced a factsheet in 2013 for this - you can find it on this page under the Diversity Calendar heading:<br><br>http://www.staffnet.manchester.ac.uk/services/equality-and-diversity/equality-groups/religionorbeliefincludinglackofbelief/<br><br>Paul<br><br>From: HEEON equal opportunities list [mailto:ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Jane Tope<br>Sent: 02 March 2015 10:37<br>To: ADMIN-EO@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Ramadan and exams<br><br>Hi folks,<br>Does anyone have a FAQs factsheet for academics and other staff about Ramadan and the exam period that they are willing to share please? [...] Maynard, Esther 2015-03-02T10:57:37+00:00 2015-03-02T10:57:37+00:00 Definition of inclusion https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;d5072123.1503 Dear all,<br><br>Does anyone have a good definition of inclusion that they use in academic and curricular? We are trying to come up with one that will fit with our learning and teaching strategy.<br><br>If so I would be grateful if you could share it with us.<br><br>Kind regards<br><br>Esther Maynard<br>Equality and Diversity Manager<br>Anglia Ruskin University<br>Student Services & HR<br>2nd Floor Tindal<br>Bishop Hall Lane<br>Chelmsford<br>CM1 1SQ<br>email: esther.maynard@anglia.ac.uk<br>telephone: 0845 196 4494<br>fax: 01245 684 246 [...] Jane Tope 2015-03-02T10:37:06+00:00 2015-03-02T10:37:06+00:00 Ramadan and exams https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;efde2cef.1503 Hi folks,<br>Does anyone have a FAQs factsheet for academics and other staff about Ramadan and the exam period that they are willing to share please?<br><br>Jane<br><br>Jane Tope<br>Equality and Diversity Adviser for Students<br>0121 414 3247<br><br>Black and minority ethnic students<br>https://www.facebook.com/BMEPROJECT<br><br>https://intranet.birmingham.ac.uk/collaboration/equality/students/getinvolved/bme/index.aspx<br><br>[6699-Equality-Scheme-web-promo] Akinsanya, Moni 2015-03-02T10:18:16+00:00 2015-03-02T10:18:16+00:00 Re: Staff Networks https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-EO;817edca2.1503 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>I contacting you to seek some advice. Here at LJMU, we are trying to re-energise all our staff networks, namely the Cultural Diversity Network, LGBT and Disability Network.<br><br>I would be very grateful if you are able to provide some information on the following from your experience which would help us with re-energising these networks going forward: [...]
